Credit Line: Purchase, The Horace W. Goldsmith Foundation Gift, through Joyce and Robert Menschel, 1997
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: Central Europe (Austria, Germany, and Switzerland), 1900 A.D.–present
Description: Struth's photographs of city streets continue a tradition of urban architectural photography that began with the systematic documentation of Paris by Charles Marville and Eugène Atget. Like his predecessors, Struth is interested in establishing a distinctive sense of place as well as documenting the historical transformations that affect the urban landscape.
